bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase custom butted alloy, integrated head tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, EHBT(Engineered Hollow Box Technology), water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A-6 Quaternary phase custom butted alloy w/A4BL(Advanced 4 Bar Linkage) system 130m travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

components.description: NEW Rock Shox Revelation SL Air w/Motion Control, PopLoc Remote & 130mm Travel
Rock Shox Monarch 3,3 w/Motion Control, 3 Position switch Lock Out
Shimano SLX Hollow Tech II w/Integrated spindle, 22/32/44T
Shimano SLX Hydraulic Disc, 180mm Centerlock rotor
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Fuji Superlite Alloy QR, 34.9mm Laser Etched
